recipes.title: Poached Chickpeas with Peppercorn Noodles
recipes.description: A dessert-friendly Chinese dish featuring chickpeas and noodles with a peppercorn twist.
steps: Prep ingredients: wash produce and diced aromatics.
Poached the chickpeas with salt, pepper, and peppercorn profile until nearly cooked.
Cook the noodles separately according to package directions; drain well.
Sauté vegetables in fat until tender-crisp.
Combine chickpeas, vegetables, and noodles; add sauce and simmer to coat.
Taste and adjust seasoning (salt, acid, heat).
Rest 3–5 minutes, garnish, and serve warm.

recipes.description: A breakfast-friendly Spanish dish featuring seitan and bulgur with a honey-mustard twist.
steps: Prep ingredients: wash produce and drained aromatics.
Grilled the seitan with salt, pepper, and honey-mustard profile until nearly cooked.
Cook the bulgur separately according to package directions; drain well.
Sauté vegetables in fat until tender-crisp.
Combine seitan, vegetables, and bulgur; add sauce and simmer to coat.
Taste and adjust seasoning (salt, acid, heat).
Rest 3–5 minutes, garnish, and serve warm.
